test-case.name: LoginWithRegisteredUser("davidspecflowqhtest1@abv.bg","specflow1","Specflow User1",null)
test-case.output: Given I am on the Home page -> done: Login_Steps.GivenIAmOnTheHomePage() (16.0s) When I enter my 'davidspecflowqhtest1@abv.bg', 'specflow1' and click on the Login button -> done: Login_Steps.WhenIEnterMyCredentialsAndClickOnLoginButton("davidspecflowqhte...", "specflow1") (0.8s) Then I should be logged in successfully and see greeting message with my 'Specflow User1' -> done: Login_Steps.ThenIShouldBeLoggedInSuccessfullyAndSeeGreetingMessage("Specflow User1") (0.6s)

test-case.name: LoginWithRegisteredUser("davidspecflowqhtest2@abv.bg","specflow2","Specflow User2",null)
test-case.output: Given I am on the Home page -> done: Login_Steps.GivenIAmOnTheHomePage() (5.3s) When I enter my 'davidspecflowqhtest2@abv.bg', 'specflow2' and click on the Login button -> done: Login_Steps.WhenIEnterMyCredentialsAndClickOnLoginButton("davidspecflowqhte...", "specflow2") (0.6s) Then I should be logged in successfully and see greeting message with my 'Specflow User2' -> done: Login_Steps.ThenIShouldBeLoggedInSuccessfullyAndSeeGreetingMessage("Specflow User2") (0.5s)

test-case.name: TryToLoginWithUnregisteredUser
test-case.output: Given I am on the Home page -> done: Login_Steps.GivenIAmOnTheHomePage() (5.3s) When I enter my 'NonExistentUser', 'NonExistentPassword' and click on the Login button -> done: Login_Steps.WhenIEnterMyCredentialsAndClickOnLoginButton("NonExistentUser", "NonExistentPassword") (0.5s) Then I shouldn't be able to login and should see an error message -> done: Login_Steps.ThenIShouldnTBeAbleToLoginAndShouldSeeAnErrorMessage() (0.0s)

test-case.name: SendNewMessage
test-case.output: Given I am logged in and on the mailbox page -> done: SendNewMessage_Steps.GivenIAmLoggedInAndOnTheMailboxPage() (6.0s) When I click on New Message button -> done: SendNewMessage_Steps.WhenIClickOnNewMessageButton() (0.6s) And write 'Hi! This is a test message.' in the message box -> done: SendNewMessage_Steps.WriteNewMessage("Hi! This is a tes...") (0.3s) And fill receiver 'tlevkova@qualityhouse.com', subject 'Test Email' and click on Send button -> done: SendNewMessage_Steps.SendMessage("tlevkova@qualityh...", "Test Email") (0.5s) Then I should see a confirmation message for successfully sent email -> done: SendNewMessage_Steps.ThenIShouldSeeAConfirmationMessageForSuccessfullySentEmail() (0.3s)
